import Axios from"axios";var instance=Axios.create({withCredentials:true,baseURL:"https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/",headers:{"API-KEY":"226f16df-9137-4f6e-9e84-3e016b8869e6"}});// Users
export var getUsers=function getUsers(trueUsersCount,activePage){return instance.get("users?count=".concat(trueUsersCount,"&page=").concat(activePage));};export var followUser=function followUser(userId){return instance.post("follow/".concat(userId));};export var unfollowUser=function unfollowUser(userId){return instance.delete("follow/".concat(userId));};//Profile
export var getProfile=function getProfile(userId){return instance.get("profile/".concat(userId));};export var getProfileStatus=function getProfileStatus(userId){return instance.get("profile/status/".concat(userId));};export var setProfileStatus=function setProfileStatus(status){return instance.put("profile/status",{status:status});};//Auth
export var getAuthInfo=function getAuthInfo(){return instance.get("auth/me");};export var login=function login(email,password,rememberMe){return instance.post("auth/login",{email:email,password:password,rememberMe:rememberMe});};export var logout=function logout(){return instance.delete("auth/login",{});};
